structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Effect of repeal of statute granting permissive power to counties.
law.text: The repeal of any statute granting permissive power or authority to counties shall not be construed to limit any power or authority which may be exercised by a fiscal court pursuant to KRS 67.083.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1978.
